meanings.definition: In a complaining or whining manner.
meanings.sent1: She asked querulously why she couldn't have dessert before dinner.
meanings.sent2: The child spoke querulously about having to go to bed early.
meanings.sent3: He looked querulously at the long line for the amusement park ride.
meanings.sent4: The old car engine sputtered querulously before finally starting.
meanings.sent5: The cat meowed querulously for more food.

meanings.definition: Expressing or characterized by complaint or grumbling.
meanings.sent1: The querulous tone of her voice annoyed her friends.
meanings.sent2: He received a querulous email from an unhappy customer.
meanings.sent3: The querulous customer demanded to speak to the manager.
meanings.sent4: The querulous weather made everyone stay indoors.
meanings.sent5: The querulous dog barked at every passing car.
